original_text: As each has received a gift, use it to serve one another, as good stewards of God's varied grace:
korean_text: 각각 은사를 받은 대로 하나님의 여러 가지 은혜를 맡은 선한 청지기 같이 서로 봉사하라

sentences.original_text: As each has received a gift,
use it to serve one another,
as good stewards of God's varied grace:
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 여러 가지 은혜의 좋은 청지기 같이:
